# These were generated by running in a fresh virtual environment
# `pip install trame plotly trame-grid-layout && pip freeze > requirements.txt`
# (all of the dependencies of VERACore except the ones provided by ParaView)
# It is necessary, in fact, for us to skip h5py, because it clashes with
# the one in ParaView and causes a seg fault.
